function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"National interests and protectionism as a by-product of covid-19 pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development of workplace modification framework","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large number of participants from all indonesian regions.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Link between air pollution and virus spread","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"5g-enabled pandemic control and prevention may lead to increased reliance on technology and decreased human interaction, potentially impacting mental and emotional well-being.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient research on the efficiency of air purification systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complexity of adopting potential solutions for long-term disease mitigation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective drugs","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased concentration loss due to stay-at-home mandates and stress.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection with uvc due to inadequate depth of penetration","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unwillingness to participate in rural tourism and preference for health safety in accommodations due to covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Severe cases of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Buildings viewed as facilitators of disease spread due to inadequate policies and measures, increasing the risk of disease transmission within built environments.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"International flights almost standing still due to lockdowns, reducing noise pollution from air traffic.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased usage of household appliances involving water consumption leading to potential waterborne diseases transmission.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai-powered surveillance for monitoring and restricting public gatherings","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High international mobility of people posing a difficult-to-predict risk.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases among construction sector participants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate surveillance of multiple diseases, including rare ones, in built to pre-pandemic behaviors and lifestyles without adequate preparedness for future pandemics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequalities exacerbating the disease burden for vulnerable populations","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fecal becoming an alternative route for clinical diagnostic testing for covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gender inequality","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 virus transmission in built environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased disease transmission in densely populated areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on pandemic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Graphene derivatives with larger lateral size have stronger adsorption ability, which affects the physicochemical interaction with
